text:
Clinton William Boulton (6 January 1948 – 1 January 2021) was an English professional footballer. He was a defender. He made 506 league appearances in a 14-year career in the Football League.
He began his professional career with Port Vale in August 1965. He later played for Torquay United. He left the club in 1979 and later played for non-league side Minehead.
